value:
$WmMPID_比翼エフラム,ch08_00_Ephraim_MM_Pair,Face|I've been thinking, Lyon.$k$pWe were summoned here to fight for
Askr's peace, but at the same time,
I wonder...am I being tested?$k$p$nMPID_リオン|As unlike you as this manner of
introspection is, Ephraim...it pleases
me to see.$k$p$nMPID_比翼エフラム|That is why I've decided to serve
Askr not as the prince of Renais,
but rather as a humble mercenary.$k$p$nMPID_リオン|I thought you might have something
like that in mind.$k$pYou want to test your potential as a
soldier, without politics getting
in the way.$k$pBut are you not concerned about
neglecting your royal duties?$k$p$nMPID_比翼エフラム|When I carve out my future, it will be
with my lance. Not with my title.$k$pI hope that, when history remembers
me, my noble birth will be only a
footnote to my strength.$k$pAskr presents the perfect opportunity
for me to become the strongest
fighter in all Magvel.$k$pI dare say I feel as if I have been
summoned here for that very reason.$k$p$nMPID_リオン|Be mindful to whom you say such
things, Ephraim. These words could
invite misunderstanding...$k$p$WmMPID_ジスト,ch08_14_Xyst_M_Normal,Face|Strongest fighter in Magvel, you say?
And as a mercenary, no less? I had
no idea you were so ambitious.$k$pSorry. Couldn't help but overhear.$k$p$WmMPID_リオン,ch08_00_Ephraim_MM_Pair,Face|Commander Gerik! Might I suggest
you keep what you have heard in
the strictest confidence?$k$p$nMPID_比翼エフラム|Why should he have to do that?
I've no intentions of secrecy.$k$p$nMPID_リオン|It will not sit well with Eirika.$k$p$nMPID_比翼エフラム|Hmm...$k$p$WmMPID_ジスト,ch08_14_Xyst_M_Normal,Face|If you're interested in the mercenary
life, Prince Ephraim, just say the
word. My crew will gladly have you.$k$p$WmMPID_比翼エフラム,ch08_00_Ephraim_MM_Pair,Face|Gerik's Mercenaries are operating
here in Askr?$k$p$WmMPID_ジスト,ch08_14_Xyst_M_Normal,Face|That's right. In fact, we're setting out
from the castle for a reconnaissance
mission tomorrow.$k$pWe're looking to see what Askr's up
against. With Commander Anna's
approval, of course.$k$p$WmMPID_リオン,ch08_00_Ephraim_MM_Pair,Face|Mercenaries live or die by the quality
of their information. Wise of you to
make that a priority.$k$p$WmMPID_ジスト,ch08_14_Xyst_M_Normal,Face|I'll take that as a compliment. So,
how about it, Prince? Want to
come along?$k$p$WmMPID_比翼エフラム,ch08_00_Ephraim_MM_Pair,Face|Absolutely.$k$pHowever, I insist that you think of me
as one of your own. I want no special
treatment on account of my title.$k$p$nMPID_リオン|Ephraim! Surely a weighty decision of
this kind warrants a little caution!$k$p$WmMPID_ジスト,ch08_14_Xyst_M_Normal,Face|Done deal. And look at that—seems
your new crewmates have arrived.$k$pListen up, everyone! This is Ephraim.
He'll be joining us tomorrow on a
trial basis.$k$p$WmMPID_ユアン,ch08_15_Ewan_M_Normal,Face|Hey, he's got the same name as the
Prince of Renais! Kind of looks a bit
like him too.$k$p$WmMPID_テティス,ch08_16_Tethys_F_Normal,Face|What an interesting development!
I'm Tethys. Welcome to the crew.$k$p$WmMPID_マリカ,ch08_11_Marica_F_Normal,Face|Hello.$k$p$WmMPID_比翼エフラム,ch08_00_Ephraim_MM_Pair,Face|Good to meet you. I intend to give
this my all, but don't hesitate to
put me in my place if I deserve it.$k$p$nMPID_リオン|I'm sorry, friend, but I can't let you
do this alone. I'm coming with you.$k$p$nMPID_比翼エフラム|Are you sure?$k$p$nMPID_リオン|Someone has to help you figure out
how to explain this to Eirika.$k$p$WmMPID_ジスト,ch08_14_Xyst_M_Normal,Face|Welcome aboard, then, both of you.
And with introductions out of the
way... Let's prepare to move out.$k$p$WmMPID_比翼エフラム,ch08_00_Ephraim_MM_Pair,Face|Now to see just how far I can get
in this world with lance alone...$k$p
